good vibes and an open bar all night 😎
Thanks to our sponsors @ArcanaNetwork, @MetisDAO and @klaytn_official for this making the event possible🤝

articles.description:
RT Mustafa Al-Bassam 🧱
Are you a weird distributed systems engineer interested in building new tech that's such a departure from old ways of thinking that it seems like made up nonsense? We're hiring:
Mustafa Al-Bassam 🧱: @kevinsekniqi @stonecoldpat0 Distributed systems were all made up one day too
You would have probably also called them nonsense and said everything is just a computer or something

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT alephv.eth
FYI, hustle culture is out. What's cool is sleep maxing, you gotta be sleeping 18 hours a night doing 2 hours of work then having a nap. You gotta be unable to get out of bed for more than 3 hours, you gotta be prioritizing laying down over meetings. I do this and it's why I win.

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT nader (🧱, 🚀) | nader.arweave.dev | nader.lens 🧢
Just pushed some new updates to the @nextjs + @LensProtocol starter project.
Easiest way to get started developing web3 social media.
It only takes a few seconds to get up & running, & you don't need a Lens handle to start building + testing it out. https://github.com/dabit3/lens-protocol-frontend
